description:
These well-made trail shoes combine lightweight athletic performance, with waterproof construction. Just what you want for walking and hiking through sun or showers.

  • Uppers are breathable mesh and suede
  • Waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out
  • Closed-cell foam bellows tongue keeps out moisture and debris
  • Removable Kinetic Fit™ insole feels comfortable underfoot
  • Protective rubber toe and heel caps
  • Multi-density contoured EVA footbed
  • Midsoles are compression-moulded EVA, with injection-moulded nylon arch shanks, and pronounced heel cups that cushion and centre the feet
  • Vibram TC5+ rubber outsole with 5mm lugs for no-slip grip
name: Merrell Moab 3 Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Women's
